name: Shrink N' Grow
description:
This is  a 2D Platformer game made with unity!

It's still a prototype, but  it is allready fun.

You can grow and shrink with the buttons on the bottom. Next to the 'grow' button, there is another button that can change what you are growing or shrinking.

you can shrink and grow yourself and a box(more will be added later)

A and D or arrow keys for movement

spacebar to jump

this game was made for Kenney's Jam 2022!
